title: Ep. 235: Joanna Vargas on How to Get Amazing Skin *Without* Needles
itunes:title: Ep. 235: Joanna Vargas on How to Get Amazing Skin *Without* Needles
itunes:subtitle: Aesthetician Joanna Vargas explains how to get amazing skin without cosmetic injectables (no judgment, they’re just not her thing). Learn about the benefits of LED therapy, radiofrequency treatments, serums, sunscreens, and dry-brushing. Plus,...
description:
Aesthetician Joanna Vargas explains how to get amazing skin without cosmetic injectables (no judgment, they’re just not her thing). Learn about the benefits of LED therapy, radiofrequency treatments, serums, sunscreens, and dry-brushing. Plus, Joanna shares her favorite skincare products and all the advice she regularly gives celebrity clients like Mindy Kaling, Elisabeth Moss, Aidy Bryant, and Daniel Levy. -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.
